title: Aatrox or Vi?
body:
Hey guys!
I've been saving for a 6300 ip champ after buying Tahm Kench (Love him! Recommend him...) and want a jgler/toplaner. My main toplaner ATM is Gnar and pretty much anyone in the jg. So which champ? Aatrox or Vi?

I'm looking for a champ that...
Is more fun
More stronger 
More helpful to the team
Good at there role (Top/jgler) 
Has a bigger win rate...

Thanks :D 
Leave comments below... Love reading and replying to them!

replies.body:
My win rate is 8-0 with ranked Vi Jungle. She's really fun and can cleanup ADC's in seconds.

I play her Warriors though a lot of people now go sated I still prefer warrior. Some people even run cinderhulk. But if you main top lane Aatrox is a lot better there (doesn't auto push waves etc).

up until they nerf it next patch/ I still reckon that cinderhulk is the best option for vi. then you can build {{item:3110}} {{item:3071}} for 40%cdr then either 2 of these{{item:3102}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3078}}

I think Vi is better as a burster (R-E-Q-E) and think you get so much damage out of Warriors and the CDR is nice too and Synergizes well with Trinity so I usually rush Warriors then {{item:1324}} / {{item:1319}} then go {{item:3078}} into Tank items like {{item:3143}} or {{item:3083}} and even if I can afford to; combo things like: {{item:3072}} or {{item:3031}}  with {{item:3134}} afterwards.

Aatrox is fun though lol he's just hard to play because one mis-time usually means you're dead in Vain whereas Vi is a lot more able to sustain Damage and has a better mechanic to do so being more of a Pick Champ than a Fighter.

Already voted by just my 2 cents

While Aatrox isn't that bad, his honestly not that great, and definitely better as a top laner, Devourer isn't bad on him, but isn't as good as it's hyped to be (as much as that made me sad).

Vi is basically confined to the jungle, you could play her top if you really want but her mana will hurt your laning, she has a great level 2/3 gank and an amazing level 6 gank and turns into a really good tank late game due to her CC in her kit, she can also go full damage and become an assassin.
Wow, Vi is winning by a lot! Thanks for the comments, keep it up!

If you are looking for a jungler with more sustain Aatrox is pretty strong with sated. However Vi in my opinion has faster clearing speeds. I know you may be looking at only Vi and Aatrox but a champ that I feel seems to do jg/top pretty well is Volibear. His teamfight is not bad and his clearing speeds are pretty good. Vi's teamfighting potential is also probably stronger than Aatrox especailly due to her Ult where she can focus on the ADC really well during team fights.

Thanks for the thought, but I do already own voli XD 

P.S, sated is like my fav jg item... Does it work on vi? 

Thanks

Well if you are looking at sated junglers aatrox would be stronger than Vi in terms of how they use the item. However junglers such as Udyr, Shyvana and Yi greatly benefit from the sated devourer item. Another champ that is really similar to Aatrox in terms of sated is Xin Zhao, while I feel that sated Xin Zhao is alot stronger it could come up to personal prefernce. Im not exactly sure How long it takes Aatrox to get sated but I know that Shyvana and Udyr have some of the earliest sated timings in the game.
Once again, I own all those champs except shyv, which whom I played devoured build many times when she was free, and I have to agree with you, udyr devourer AD is just stupidly broken... XD

Vi doesn't really play top anymore. She's 99% of the time played in the Jungle.

Aatrox has a slightly better winrate. Devourer Aatroxatm is really strong though.

Vi is in a pretty average place in terms of power atm. She's still fun though.
